augmentcards.name: Golden Prelude
augmentcards.desc: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

augmentcards.name: Prismatic Prelude
augmentcards.desc: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

augmentcards.name: Golden Gala
augmentcards.desc: All augments offered this game will be gold tier.

augmentcards.name: Prismatic Party
augmentcards.desc: All augments offered this game will be prismatic tier.

augmentcards.name: Golden Finale
augmentcards.desc: The last augment offered this game will be gold tier.

augmentcards.name: Prismatic Finale
augmentcards.desc: The last augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

augmentcards.name: Ascending Augments
augmentcards.desc: Augments this game will be silver, gold, then prismatic tier.

champ.name: Champion Duplicator
champ.desc: Start the game with a Champion Duplicator.

champ.name: Champion Delivery
champ.desc: Twice per stage, gain a high cost champion. The value goes up with game time.

champ.name: Champion Conference
champ.desc: Every stage, gain a champion that fits your team.

item.name: Artifact Anvil
item.desc: Start with 1 Artifact anvil. Artifacts are powerful items that offer unique effects.

item.name: Radiant Item
item.desc: On stage 3-7, gain a Magnetic Remover and select 1 of 5 Radiant items (very powerful versions of completed items).

item.name: Tactician\'s Crown
item.desc: Start with a Tactician\'s Crown (gain +1 team size).

item.name: Anvil Buffet
item.desc: All items drop as component anvils.

item.name: Let \'Em Cook
item.desc: Start with a Spatula and a Frying Pan.

coins.name: Pot of Gold
coins.desc: At stage 6-1, all living players split a pot of 250 gold.

coins.name: Item Payout
coins.desc: Every time you build a completed item, gain 2 gold.

coins.name: Gold Subscription
coins.desc: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

spatula.name: Scuttle Puddle
spatula.desc: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot.

spatula.name: Radiant Blessing
spatula.desc: At 40 player health, receive a blessing that contains powerful loot.

spatula.name: Loot Subscription
spatula.desc: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

spatula.name: Loaded Carousels
spatula.desc: Each champion on a component carousel has 2 components on them instead of 1.

spatula.name: Crab Rave
spatula.desc: Dancing crabs replace monsters and drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS.

spatula.name: Trainer Golems
spatula.desc: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

charms.name: Overachievers
charms.desc: Powerful Charms may appear earlier in the game.
